title: Espresso
description: Espresso is a concentrated form of coffee produced by forcing hot water under high pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

title: Americano
description: Caff√® americano, also known as americano or American, is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso shot with hot water at a 1:3 to 1:4 ratio,

title: Cappuccino
description: A cappuccino is similar to a latte, but this espresso drink involves less steamed milk and more foam.

title: Mocha
description: A mocha is a coffee drink that traditionally combines the flavors of espresso, steamed milk and chocolate..

title: Cold Brew Blend
description: This is mix of washed honey sundried coffee and specially handcrafted for cold brew blend.

title: Latte
description: A coffee drink made by mixing steamed milk and espresso with a layer of foam added to the top.

title: Cheesecake
description: Classic cheesecake with a buttery crust.
